short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced Insights into Google Scholar Profiles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScholarLens is a browser extension designed for academics, researchers, and enthusiasts who want deeper insights into publication data and contribution of an author from Google Scholar.
